title: Platform to find the best writing jobs in one place
description: I co-founded Best Writing, an online platform that simplifies the search for the best writing jobs worldwide. Initially the platform was build entirely using no-code tools. As the project evolved we designed and build a custom website using Next.js, Supabase and Tailwind CSS. The platform is currently in beta and we are looking for writers to join the platform.

title: Mobile app for charging electric cars
Club app for F.C. Copenhagen football fans
description: I led the design of a fan engagement mobile app for F.C. Copenhagen football club. From gathering stakeholder input to creating experience flows, UI mockups and guiding the development a React Native application. I ensured the app provided live match updates, exclusive news, behind-the-scenes content, and digital stadium tickets. I also created a scalable design system for future football club mobile app development.

title: Website to buy and sell luxury villas
